rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETC2430} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: Financial mathematics under uncertainty will apply the ideas of interest rates, present values, cash flow modelling and profit testing in the context of certain payments and payments dependent on individual deaths or other uncertain risk. We will also introduce stochastic modelling techniques applied to actuarial and financial contexts.Students will cover the topics of present values and accumulated values, equations of value, markov modelling, survival models, life tables and contingent products.
